SELECT r.room_id, CASE #{user_id} WHEN r.seller_id THEN r.buyer_id WHEN r.buyer_id THEN r.seller_id END AS other_user_id, u.profile_img other_profile_img, u.nickname other_nickname, c.chat_content last_chat_content, DATE_FORMAT(c.send_date, '%Y년 %m월 %d일') last_send_date, t.town_name post_town_name FROM chatting_room_tbl22 r JOIN user_tbl22 u ON (CASE #{user_id} WHEN r.seller_id THEN r.buyer_id WHEN r.buyer_id THEN r.seller_id END) = u.user_id JOIN chatting_content_tbl22 c ON r.room_id = c.room_id JOIN post_tbl22 p ON r.post_id = p.post_id JOIN town_tbl22 t ON p.town_code = t.town_code WHERE r.chatting_status IN(0, (CASE #{user_id} WHEN r.seller_id THEN 2 WHEN r.buyer_id THEN 1 END) ) AND (r.seller_id = #{user_id} OR r.buyer_id = #{user_id}) AND c.send_date IN(SELECT MAX(send_date) FROM chatting_content_tbl22 GROUP BY room_id) ORDER BY c.send_date DESC ;
SELECT sender_id, DATE_FORMAT(send_date, '%Y년 %m월 %d일') date, chat_content, DATE_FORMAT(send_date, '%H:%i') time FROM chatting_content_tbl22 WHERE room_id = #{room_id} ORDER BY send_date

SELECT r.seller_id, r.post_id, p.title post_title, p.post_img, u.profile_img other_profile_img, u.nickname other_nickname, FORMAT(p.price,0) post_price FROM chatting_room_tbl22 r JOIN post_tbl22 p ON r.post_id = p.post_id JOIN user_tbl22 u ON (CASE #{user_id} WHEN r.seller_id THEN r.buyer_id WHEN r.buyer_id THEN r.seller_id END) = u.user_id WHERE room_id = #{room_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE chatting_room_tbl22 SET chatting_status = (CASE #{user_id} WHEN seller_id THEN 1 WHEN buyer_id THEN 2 END) WHERE room_id = #{room_id}
